column4: ubuntu uses a default mtu value of 1500, but I want to set it to 1492. This is no problem with 'sudo ifconfig wlan0 mtu 1492', but after a reboot the mtu value is again 1500. How can I set the mtu value PERMANENTLY to 1492 ???
right click -> edit, first tab has MTU options
if you have to start it as root though use gksu <program>
